entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:55 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 03:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
